alert.note: Alert for Madison; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 9:29AM CDT until May 25 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... South central Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Western Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 1015 AM CDT. * At 929 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Newlight to near Natchez, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Newlight around 935 AM CDT. Somerset around 945 AM CDT. Afton around 955 AM CDT. Alcorn, St. Joseph and Lorman around 1000 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
